newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Oklahoma feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Oklahoma feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.

text.p: USDA said trade was active in the panhandle area Thursday morning, turned slow late. Slaughter steers and heifers closed steady.

Feedlots reported good inquiry from buyers until around noon, light to moderate afternoon. Sales reported on 30,100 slaughter steers and 20,900 heifers; 95,900 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 31,400 formulated and 600 previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week.
Steers - select and choice 2-3 1100-1250 lbs 65.00. Select, few choice 2-3 1150-1250 lbs 64.00.
Wk to Date: 95,900 Week Ago: 80,200 Year Ago: 127,700
